#summary Extending the basic StockWatcher application

=Add More Features=

Now that you've covered [GettingStartedBasics the basics] of GWT development, you can start exploring more specialized features that you'll likely need as you build more complex applications with GWT.

 * [GettingStartedRPC Use remote procedure calls] Adding a call to a server using GWT-RPC.

 * [GettingStartedI18n Internationalize] Translating the !StockWatcher user interface into another language.

 * [GettingStartedJSON Add JSON support] Retrieving JSON data from a server via HTTP
 
 * [GettingStartedJUnit Test with JUnit] Adding unit tests to the application.
